1.0.name: wordpress/buddypress-extended-friendship-request
1.0.description:
BuddyPress Extended Friendship Request Plugin allows users to send a personalized message with the friendship request on BuddyPress based Social Networks.

How it works:-

When a users clicks on Add friend, It shows him/her a small popup to enter some personalized message The user can enter a personalized message and click on the Send request to send the request.
